metadata.title: 2Pcs Hot Air Balloon Wind Spinner Rainbow Whirl Hanging Ornament Spinning Balloon Windmill Toy Set for Outdoor Garden Patio Yard Home Decoration
features: Beautiful Appearance: With the bright and rich color, shinny mini hot balloon shape, these wind spinners are very beautiful and eye catching, a great decoration and gift for your friends or kids.
Easy to Use: These hot air balloon spinners are detachable, easy to install and store, convenient to hang on rope and nails, lightweight, portable and reusable.
Durable: These balloon whirl are made of cloth and well process, which is water and wind proof, durable and steady, not easy to damage and deform.
Widely Application: These rainbow wind spinners are widely suitable for indoor and outdoor decoration, like garden, patio, parks, festivals and other occasions.
100% Customer Satisfaction: There is absolutely no risk in ordering now. If you are not completely satisfied, please contact us and you will get the full support of our team.
